weekly_loop.primary_activity: Converting small JavaScript components into strict TypeScript functional components.
weekly_loop.secondary_activity: Reading documentation on Utility Types and React-specific TS definitions.

difficulty_profile.comfortable: Creating basic JSX structures and simple primitive state.
difficulty_profile.challenging: Eliminating all instances of 'any' and correctly typing complex Event objects.

objective: Zero compiler errors in a project with 5+ components
Successful implementation of custom typed Props interfaces
subjective: Feeling less friction when the IDE flags a type mismatch
Increased confidence in prop drilling without runtime errors

weekly_loop.primary_activity: Building a data-driven application that fetches from a typed API.
weekly_loop.secondary_activity: Refactoring existing state management to use type-safe useReducer or Context.

difficulty_profile.comfortable: Managing local component state with basic interfaces.
difficulty_profile.challenging: Defining generic types for API wrappers and handling null/undefined in data fetching.

objective: Completion of a multi-page dashboard with type-safe routing
Successful use of Generics in at least two reusable components
subjective: Reduced reliance on console.log for debugging data shapes
Intuitive understanding of when to use an Interface vs a Type alias

objective: Percentage of codebase covered by strict type checking
Number of successful builds without 'any' overrides
Total hours of hands-on coding completed per week
subjective: Self-reported frustration level when encountering complex TS errors
Perceived speed of feature implementation compared to JS-only workflow

architect_notes: Since I have a high dropout risk and a tendency to quit, I've kept the weekly time commitment low but consistent.
The 'gentle' approach focuses on incremental wins—fixing one red underline at a time rather than huge architectural overhauls.
I'm prioritizing the 'practice' learning style by minimizing theoretical reading in favor of refactoring existing logic.

details.reason: User initiated a new learning session.

timeline.title: Initial Practice Strategy Created
timeline.summary: Initial practice strategy created for ['Learn React TS'].
